welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lenox, a charming and historic town known for its rich cultural heritage and beautiful natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and experience all that our vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Griffiss AFB Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Griffiss AFB Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Syracuse Hancock International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Syracuse Hancock International Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
